list.title: module:sendEmail~sendEmail
list.description: main runner function. on form submit, execute sendEmail, end script. sendEmail(true) to send all notifications to 'admin' for testing. processing parameters specific to the needs of this form edit this function to update required 'data' parameters and add any helper scripts

list.title: module:sendEmail~sendEmail~data
list.description: extract helper code and info from procParams (var parameters) assumption: parameters.helper contains an object of helper vars / funcs var helper = parameters.helper;
